input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA is portable air conditioner. It can cool down or heat up the temperature easily. Also, you can feel the temperature change instantly because QOOLA is made of stainless steel. Lastly, it makes fresh air by removal of contaminant.

Tone: passionate

Audience: who hates summer and winter
sentences: Looking for a way to escape the heat and cold? Look no further than QOOLA! Our portable air conditioner can quickly cool or heat the temperature, and our stainless steel construction means you'll feel the change instantly.

Summertime is unbearable without QOOLA! This portable air conditioner can quickly cool down or heat up the temperature, making it perfect for any season. Plus, QOOLA is made of stainless steel, so you can feel the temperature change instantly.
Summer is hot, and winter is cold. Why not just use QOOLA and cool down or heat up the temperature easily? You can feel the temperature change instantly because QOOLA is made of stainless steel.
